attributes.action: admit that you and your party are guilty of treason.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the present government are guilty of treason and have been, and still are, striving to bring this once great nation to it's knee's. it is time to admit your guilt and own up to what you have done on behalf of the eu

rejection.details:
It is not clear what your petition is about. If it is in regards to Europe, there are currently a number of related petitions on the site: 

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Lisbon-ref/ http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/ECTTOL/ http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/LeaveEU1/
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
